name: Don't Forget the Lyrics
description:
Don´t forget is a game where you'll have to guess the rest of the song, you will hear part of the song and will be able to read that part´s lyric. You'll have to complete the lyrics.

To pass the level you'll have to guess 6 out of the 12 songs of each level. You will be able to ask for a hint to the application, but it will cost you one point.
